typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> countrylookup
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> casedeathsource
casedeathsource filter(continent =='Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> Filtereuropedata
Filtereuropedata select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported'+'_date' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Requiredfieldselection
Requiredfieldselection pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		source,
		reported_date),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['confirmed cases', 'deaths']),
	counts = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> pivotcount
pivotcount, countrylookup lookup(pivotcount@country == countrylookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcountrycode
Lookupcountrycode select(mapColumn(
		country = pivotcount@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population = pivotcount@population,
		{confirmed cases_counts},
		deaths_counts,
		reported_date,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectfield
Selectfield sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['case_death_proc.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkcasedeath

source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> hospitalsource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> lookupcountry
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dimdatesource
hospitalsource, lookupcountry lookup(hospitalsource@country == lookupcountry@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcountryhos
Lookupcountryhos select(mapColumn(
		country = hospitalsource@country,
		indicator,
		reported_date = date,
		reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source,
		country = lookupcountry@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectfield
Selectfield split(indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k' || indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitdailyweekly@(splitweekly, daily)
dimdatesource aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> Aggregatedate
ConditionalSplitdailyweekly@splitweekly, Aggregatedate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joindateweek
Joindateweek pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivotweekly
ConditionalSplitdailyweekly@daily pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		reported_year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily hospital occupancy', 'Daily ICU occupancy']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivotdaily
Pivotweekly sort(desc(reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> Sortweekly
Pivotdaily sort(desc(reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> Sortdaily
Sortweekly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		{Weekly hospital occupancy} = {Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count},
		{Weekly ICU occupancy} = {Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sortdaily select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		reported_year_week,
		source,
		{ hospital occupancy_count} = {Daily hospital occupancy_count},
		{ICU occupancy_count} = {Daily ICU occupancy_count}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['hospital_adm_daily.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkdaily
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		population as string,
		{confirmed cases_counts} as string,
		deaths_counts as string,
		reported_date as string,
		source as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['hospital_weekly'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkweekly

source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		year_week as string,
		new_cases as string,
		tests_done as string,
		population as string,
		testing_rate as string,
		positivity_rate as string,
		testing_data_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Testdata
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Countrylkpup
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Datelkpup
Testdata, Countrylkpup lookup(country_code == country_code_2_digit,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcountry
Datelkpup aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> dateaggre
Lookupcountry, dateaggre lookup(year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupdate
Lookupdate select(mapColumn(
		country = Testdata@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		ecdc_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		new_cases,
		tests_done,
		population = Testdata@population,
		testing_rate,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectrequiredfields
Selectrequiredfields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinktestdata
